thread.title: Billionaire Scion Seeks $58 Million for Unfinished Penthouse

author: WSJ Real Estate
title: Billionaire Scion Seeks $58 Million for Unfinished Penthouse
text:
COMMERCIAL REAL ESTATE Spring Home Sales Could Be the Weakest in Years The economy is booming, take-home pay is rising and millennials are getting married and having children. Despite all those homebuying catalysts, this could be one of the weakest spring selling seasons in recent years.
REITs With Women on Their Boards Outperform Those With Only Men
The real-estate industry’s reputation for being an old boys’ network might be hurting investors in real-estate investment trusts with boards that haven’t advanced beyond... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
